column5: Does anyone know what boat launch is best to use and if they dredge the channel?  I've heard the perch fishing is hot right now, and i am going out with some friends canada day.  Anyone know the magic depth to fish?  Thanks!
fish at the end of the rock pier my son caught alot of nice ones the other day . Bradfields is a good launch over the bridge and to the left.35 feet depth seems to work good luck.
thanks a bunch geo, ill let you know how we made out.
Last Sat we headed out of Port Burwell to the east a fair distance and out to 47 fow. The two of us brought home about 80 jumbo's.
